text: Waidhofen an der Thaya is an Austrian town in the state of Lower Austria. The town is the capital of the district of the same name. It is on the German Thaya river. == Twin cities == * Heubach, Germany since 1982 * Telƒç, Czech Republic since 1992 == References == == Other websites == * Official website of the town of Waidhofen an der Thaya Category:Settlements in Lower Austria
title: Waidhofen an der Thaya
